FuncDef: This command configures the client maintenance entity group (MEG) level(s) to use for AIS message generation. Up to 7 levels can be provisioned with the restriction that the client MEG level must be higher than the local MEG level. Only the lowest client MEG level will be used for facility MEPs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the client MEG level. Values-1 to 7. ParamDefault: Default- 1
